title: First Year
description: Get all 4 books of the First Year series in this special complete edition--a $15 value, over 550 pages long! A unique, confident and passionate novel series akin to a sexy gay romance showContains All 4 Popular Parts:New HomeBest Summer HolidaysBack to SchoolDecisions Read through the First Year of Matt and Kevin's relationship full of surprises, unexpected discoveries and hard decisions
author: James Benedict Noble
